body:
Comment 2 by **rodseth**: 
I guess the issue have been fixed recently, then. I'm using the package that comes with
Arch Linux, so there is no obvious or "natural" way of updating the compiler (and the
Arch packages are pretty fresh, in general).

However, I can checkout Go and install it from sources, if that's the blessed course of
action. In fact, I can wrap the Go compiler in a script that always updates the sources
first, just in case I would stumble upon a bug. ;)

In all seriousness, thanks for looking at and closing this issue.
